steamVr.title: SteamVR
steamVr.description: Enable or disable specific tracking parts. <1></1>Useful if you want more control over what SlimeVR does.

filtering.title: Filtering
filtering.description: Choose the filtering type for your trackers. <1></1>Extrapolation predicts movement while interpolation smoothens movement.

noFiltering.title: No filtering
noFiltering.description: Use measurements as is, will not do any filtering.

smoothing.title: Smoothing
smoothing.description: Smooths the movements but adds some latency.

prediction.title: Prediction
prediction.description: Reduces latency and makes movements more snappy, but may increase jitter.

devMode.title: Developer Mode
devMode.description: This mode can be useful if you need in-depth data or to interact<1></1>with connected trackers on a more advanced level

serialConsole.title: Serial Console
serialConsole.description: This is a live information feed for serial communication. May be useful if you need to know the firmware is acting up.
